definition: member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker

sentences.english: Frankish poet and prelate at the court of Charlemagne.
sentences.chinese: 法兰克诗人和查理曼宫廷的高级教士。

sentences.english: This is what preacher’s talk of - this light in the darkness.
sentences.chinese: 传教士会说，这黑暗中的光芒啊。

sentences.english: Padre' is frequently used in the military.
sentences.chinese: 随军教士常常用于军队中的牧师。

sentences.english: We young Mormon men enter the Aaronic priesthood when we're twelve.
sentences.chinese: 我们年轻的摩门男子在十二岁时就是次级传教士了。

sentences.english: These churchmen 's acquaintance with France stopped short at Joan of Arc.
sentences.chinese: 这些传教士对法国的了解仅限于有关圣女贞德的传说。

sentences.english: The introduction of western medicine into China was closely related to the medical activities of western missionaries in China.
sentences.chinese: 西医学的传入与传教士在华的医学活动分不开。

sentences.english: Priests vowed their lives to the service of the church.
sentences.chinese: 教士们立誓终生为教会服务。

sentences.english: But radical Shi'ite cleric Moqtada al-Sadr, is threatening to torpedo the vote.
sentences.chinese: 但是激进的什叶派教士萨德尔威胁要破坏议会的投票。

sentences.english: There was only one wedding ring, which the rabbi had brought along.
sentences.chinese: 只有一枚婚戒，还是教士带来的。

sentences.english: In the same year an itinerant black preacher arrived in Los Angeles.
sentences.chinese: 就在同一年，一个黑人巡回传教士抵达了洛杉矶。

sentences.english: A happy smile spread over his broad, priest -like face.
sentences.chinese: 他那张宽阔的教士般虔诚的脸上展露出愉快的笑容。

sentences.english: How is one a precept-breaking mixed-up priest?
sentences.chinese: 如何是一个人破坏戒律的混杂教士？

sentences.english: A Protestant churchman came to talk to her, ‘My lady, ’he said.‘Pray
sentences.chinese: 一个新教教士走过来和她说话。

sentences.english: The preacher sermonized to the teacher's teacup.
sentences.chinese: 传教士对著老师的茶杯说教。

sentences.english: The minister left the Church of England and went across to Rome.
sentences.chinese: 该教士脱离了英国国教圣公会，皈依了罗马天主教。

sentences.english: The king demanded that the man should come forward to answer the charge in a civil court, but Becket refused to allow this.
sentences.chinese: 国王要求此教士到世俗法庭受审，但贝克特予以拒绝。

definition: nun or sister (of the Roman Catholic or Greek Orthodox churches)
the Church (as Royal Court)/the Holy See/the Vatican
